resources.string: Consider moving to open area so the gps can track your location easier
You can start the quiz once you are inside one of the institutions
To start the game you have to be connected to the internet
This application uses internet and location services
\"When you find the clue we are looking for, take a picture of it, and if the picture matches proceed to the next clue\"
Processing the image... this may take a while
Are you sure you want to exit? all your progress will be lost.
You have to turn on your wifi or mobile data in order to use this app
